resources.string:
• Trends with Friends is a game that consists of multiple rounds.
 • In each round you will be given a word, you will then need to think of a word that people google with that word.
 • Your word and the given word will then be combined to become your query.
 • Google Trends will then calculate a score for all the queries in that round.
 • At the end of the last round the scores are tallied and whoever has the highest score wins.
